channel.title: [REQUEST] Pokemon Online Banner
channel.description:
Harro GFX peoples. I have entered upon your territory to make a friendly request. As some of you may know, I am currently working on a Pokemon MMO, and designing a site for it now. I'm currently in need of a logo, and since I'm better with a cock in my mouth than with Photoshop, I'm in a bit of a need for a logo the site. The logo dimensions are 765x165. The text should say "Pokemon Online" in the center, in the font used on Pokemon box art (i.e. http://www.gamerhelp.com/screens/110141/box/box_110141.jpg, but it should say "Online" instead of "Emerald Version") The color scheme should match the logo's site's theme: http://io9Labs.com/poke/. Also, can you please include and image of a Mudkip on the left (http://bestuff.com/images/images_of_stuff/210x600/mudkip-59228.jpg) and a Slowpoke on the right (http://i30.photobucket.com/albums/c315/yomamafat32/slowpoke-pokemon.gif). I would appreciate it very much if you can include the PSD.
Thanks in advance, ~io9`
EDIT: Updated the slowpoke link

item.title: [REQUEST] Pokemon Online Banner
item.dc:creator: @boriz boriz
item.description:
@boriz wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:4, topic:228665”]I’ll make an attempt at it.

EDIT: Can you give me the color codes for the website? Like the Green and the Blues

EDIT2: Guesstimated, here it is. I don’t really like it, mainly because of the badly done Pokemon on it.

PSD: http://uploadpsd.com/file/36719.psd[/quote]

L2center

io9 it looks better than mine, except the colours are a bit dull…

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Pokemon Online Banner
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

GJ ThAt0n36Uy, I just tweaked yours just a bit (well, quite a bit :S), so the final outcome is this:

I’ll update when I find a better quality Pokemon logo.
EDIT: I’m now abusing wikipedia’s SVG thumbnail thingy.
EDIT2: Alldun

Also, if you wanna see it in action: http://io9Labs.com/poke/

Read full topic
